ðŸ“– Summary: Clippy is an Electron-based application that allows users to run large language models (LLMs) locally on their computers using a 1990s-inspired user interface. It leverages Llama.cpp for efficient model execution and supports various GGUF models, offering a nostalgic yet functional way to interact with modern AI technology.
